structure.unit: Inspection And Sale Of Food, Drugs And Various Articles

law.catch_line: Sale Of Veal Of Calf Less Than Two Weeks Old
law.text: Whoever kills or causes to be killed a calf when less than two weeks old, with intent to sell for food the veal thereof, or knowingly sells for food, offers or exposes for sale therefor, or has in his possession with intent to sell for food, the veal of a calf so killed shall be punished by a fine of not more than one hundred dollars or by imprisonment for not more than two months, or both.
